summary: Just a small mod to increase deadric aartifacts
descriptionHtml:
I always thought the deadric armour and weapons never lived up to their expectations, so I just gave them a bit of a damage and armour boost and I decreased the weights. This mod does not change the enchantments because I thought they were fine. I pnly changed 5
The base damage and armour. With staffs I couldn't do much so I just increased the speed they cast the spells.Â 

If anyone has any suggestions or ideas please leave let me know
author: gervinhohead
